summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FOREST RIVER SALEM RECREATIONAL VEHICLE EQUIPPED WITH VAIL SPORT ST LH99 TIRES, SIZE 225/75D15. THE CONTACT NOTICED TREAD SEPARATION AND A BUBBLE ON THE REAR PASSENGER SIDE TIRE. THE CONTACT REPLACED THE ORIGINAL TIRE WITH THE SPARE TIRE. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE REAR DRIVER SIDE TIRE DEFLATED AND CONTAINED A BUBBLE. THE VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14T001000 (TIRES). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE APPROXIMATE VEHICLE AND TIRE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 900. ..UPDATED 09/30/14 *BF    THE CONSUMER STATED THE MANUFACTURER REPLACED THE ONE TIRE THAT HAD THE SEPARATION AND BUBBLE BUT, DECLINED THE REQUEST TO REPLACE ALL OTHER TIRES DUE TO EXPIRED WARRANTY.  UPDATED 3/3/15  *JS
